```{=html}
<div id="observablehq-prettyEquation-eb5938f5"></div>
<div id="observablehq-chart-eb5938f5"></div>
<div id="observablehq-controls-eb5938f5"></div>
<div id="observablehq-shareableLink-eb5938f5"></div>
<div id="observablehq-shareButton-eb5938f5"></div>

<script type="module">
import {Runtime, Inspector} from "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@observablehq/runtime@4/dist/runtime.js";
import define from "https://api.observablehq.com/@andrew-primer-e/modskurt/2.js?v=3";
new Runtime().module(define, name => {
  if (name === "prettyEquation") return new Inspector(document.querySelector("#observablehq-prettyEquation-eb5938f5"));
  if (name === "chart") return new Inspector(document.querySelector("#observablehq-chart-eb5938f5"));
  if (name === "controls") return new Inspector(document.querySelector("#observablehq-controls-eb5938f5"));
  if (name === "shareableLink") return new Inspector(document.querySelector("#observablehq-shareableLink-eb5938f5"));
  if (name === "shareButton") return new Inspector(document.querySelector("#observablehq-shareButton-eb5938f5"));
});
</script>
```
